I'm tired of it.\""},{"lineNumber":112039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":112040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってわけでやっぱお前クビ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So yeah, you're fired after all.\""},{"lineNumber":112041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとーーーーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whaaaaaat!?\""},{"lineNumber":112042,"originalJapaneseLine":"サムソンはクビになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Samson was fired."},{"lineNumber":112043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、少々お待ち下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-Please wait a moment!"},{"lineNumber":112044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのようなことを仰らずに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't say such things!\""},{"lineNumber":112045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毎週饅頭食わされる身にもなってみろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Put yourself in the shoes of someone forced to eat manju every week."},{"lineNumber":112046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体があんこ臭くなりそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"My body might start to smell like red bean paste.\""},{"lineNumber":112047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-That can't be!"},{"lineNumber":112048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作れと仰ったのは総統なのに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the General who told me to make them!\""},{"lineNumber":112049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たまにはシュークリームとか持ってこい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bring something like cream puffs once in a while."},{"lineNumber":112050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気の利かん奴め」","translatedEnglishLine":"You inconsiderate guy.\""},{"lineNumber":112051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あわわわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Awwawa...\""},{"lineNumber":112052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チルディ殿ー！　どうか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Childi! Please!"},{"lineNumber":112053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私にシュークリームの作り方を","translatedEnglishLine":"Teach me how to make cream puffs!"},{"lineNumber":112054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　教えてくだされー！」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":112055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう！　なんですの、あなたは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, geez! What are you?!\""},{"lineNumber":112056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私にご指導ご鞭撻をーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Give me your guidance and encouragement---!\""},{"lineNumber":112057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お菓子は作りません！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will not make sweets!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":112058,"originalJapaneseLine":"饅頭君ことサムソンは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Manju-kun, also known as Samson,"},{"lineNumber":112059,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスの剣士、チルディに","translatedEnglishLine":"was taught how to make cream puffs by Childi,"},{"lineNumber":112060,"originalJapaneseLine":"シュークリームの作り方を教わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a swordsman of Leazas."},{"lineNumber":112061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「命の限り、戦いましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let’s fight to the death.\""},{"lineNumber":112062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はカラーのアカシロって子を呼んだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, I have called a girl named Akashiro from Kalar.\""},{"lineNumber":112063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統、失礼いたします」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General Rance, excuse me.\""},{"lineNumber":112064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しつれいいたしまーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me!\""},{"lineNumber":112065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　なんだ、リセットまで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What, even Reset?\""},{"lineNumber":112066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":112067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が呼ばれていると聞くと、","translatedEnglishLine":"When she hears that I am called,"},{"lineNumber":112068,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分も絶対に行く、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"she insists she must come too.\""},{"lineNumber":112069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君達、仲良し？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you two close?\""},{"lineNumber":112070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、なかよしだよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, we’re close.\""},{"lineNumber":112071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仲良し、というか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Close, or rather...\""},{"lineNumber":112072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は姫様――リセット様の乳母兼護衛役です」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the nursing mother and bodyguard of Princess Reset.\""},{"lineNumber":112073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、乳母。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? A nursing mother."},{"lineNumber":112074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうか、そういう奴も中にはいるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, there are such people among you.\""},{"lineNumber":112075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、以前より父親である、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I have long wished to greet General Rance, who is like a father to me."},{"lineNumber":112076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統にはご挨拶を、と思っていました。","translatedEnglishLine":"I have been thinking to pay my respects."},{"lineNumber":112077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こういった機会を頂けたことを感謝します」","translatedEnglishLine":"I appreciate having this opportunity.\""},{"lineNumber":112078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、うんうん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":112079,"originalJapaneseLine":"（う〜〜ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm...)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご指導ご鞭撻を頂きたいものだ」「うむうむ、武に優れた者は世界中に沢山いる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I would like to receive your guidance and encouragement." "Hmm hmm, there are many who excel in martial prowess all over the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの方々にも一度稽古をつけて頂くのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having the people of Leazas train us once might not be bad either...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪くないかも知れぬな……」
「よう、饅頭君」
「サムソンです」
「本日のお饅頭は塩饅頭にしてみました。
塩気があんこの甘みを引き立ててくれるかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought the saltiness might enhance the sweetness of the red bean paste."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「饅頭いらん。飽きた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want manju. I'm tired of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってわけでやっぱお前クビ」
「なんとーーーーーーー！？」
サムソンはクビになった。
「しょ、少々お待ち下さい！
そのようなことを仰らずに！」
「毎週饅頭食わされる身にもなってみろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Put yourself in the shoes of someone forced to eat manju every week.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体があんこ臭くなりそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My body might start to smell like red bean paste."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな！
作れと仰ったのは総統なのに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the General who told me to make them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たまにはシュークリームとか持ってこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Bring something like cream puffs once in a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気の利かん奴め」
「あわわわ……」
「チルディ殿ー！　どうか！
私にシュークリームの作り方を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teach me how to make cream puffs!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えてくだされー！」
「ああもう！　なんですの、あなたは！」
「私にご指導ご鞭撻をーーー！」
「お菓子は作りません！！！！」
饅頭君ことサムソンは、
リーザスの剣士、チルディに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was taught how to make cream puffs by Childi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュークリームの作り方を教わった。
「命の限り、戦いましょう」
「今日はカラーのアカシロって子を呼んだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, I have called a girl named Akashiro from Kalar."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統、失礼いたします」
「しつれいいたしまーす！」
「あれ？　なんだ、リセットまで」
「はあ……
私が呼ばれていると聞くと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she hears that I am called,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分も絶対に行く、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she insists she must come too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君達、仲良し？」
「うん、なかよしだよー」
「仲良し、というか……
私は姫様――リセット様の乳母兼護衛役です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the nursing mother and bodyguard of Princess Reset."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、乳母。
そうか、そういう奴も中にはいるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, there are such people among you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、以前より父親である、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I have long wished to greet General Rance, who is like a father to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統にはご挨拶を、と思っていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have been thinking to pay my respects.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういった機会を頂けたことを感謝します」
「あー、うんうん」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
